title: Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Solarium Elevations", January 23, 1936
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 537-2/ 1/2"-1'0", 1/2"-1'0"/ L. BLOCK., Olsson/ 1/23/36, 4, L & B Wright/ " ", 1, Merrick/ 1/28/36, 1, Office/ 2/3/36, 1, Office/ 2/3/36, 1, L & B Chic. Jan 27-26, Olsson; inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, materials
description: Plan and elevations for solarium. Entrance to room at center of north wall; radio and storage for bridge tables at right of door against north wall. Sofa along south east corner and south wall, curving at corner. Circular aquarium in front of sofa near right; flower trough begin sofa in corner. Flower trough along left side of south wall with lights underneath. Bar perpendicular to west wall and curving near north wall. Back bar behind bar with glass shelves. Flower trough along north wall at left; buffet server perpendicular to north wall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Solarium Elevations", January 23, 1936.
January 23, 1936. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-576.
